title: Blended mathematics pedagogy enhancement course using adaptive learning platforms (ALP)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental grasp of elementary mathematics teaching theories and curricula
context.additional_context: Customized mathematics pedagogy training for pre-/in-service elementary teachers using smartphone-based Adaptive Learning Platforms (ALP).

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized mathematics lessons incorporating individual diagnostic results using ALP
Learners can analyze formative assessment data from ALP in blended learning environments to establish instructional improvement strategies
Learners can develop supplementary/enrichment materials based on ALP-based assessment results categorized by understanding levels

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
